text: Lot ga madamada gi daha gaa mmada gi di gowaa i taalinga di monowai Jordan, ga hanadu loo gi Zoar, e logo ono wai e hai be di Hadagee a Dimaadua,13.10 di Hadagee a Dimaadua deenei la di hadagee i Eden (Genesis 2.10) be e hai be tenua go Egypt. (Deenei la i mua Dimaadua ne hagahuaidu Sodom mo Gomorrah.)13.10 Genesis 19.24
